data.content: g3y1.5.1 complete: knots-compat.ts provides canonical KNOTS_TO_FOOLERY_STATUS and FOOLERY_TO_KNOTS_STATUS maps, KNOTS_METADATA_KEYS, edge kind constants. KnotsBackend.toBeat() preserves raw Knots state in Beat.metadata[knotsState]. 55 tests in knots-compat.test.ts + metadata tests in knots-guardrails.test.ts. Ref: 0a6e4ab..26712a8
